name: Harold & Fils, Alchimie Sur Mesure
description:
You are Will, heir of Harold, a very famous alchemist.

He opened this shop in order to provide tools and potions to anybody.

You own this shop now, but these days, the alchemy business is not at its best...

You must try to save this shop, and preserve your legacy in memory of Harold!

Anyway, your father was a genius, and he bequeathed you some of its greatest ideas.

You could work on one of its old projects, and see where it leads!
